item.description:
Five minutes goes by in a flash! Before you know it, you`ll be on your last date. Make a check next to the names of people you wish to hear from again and turn in your dating
card.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
PRE-PAYMENT ONLY ACCEPTED, PLEASE!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

PAYMENT POLICY:
$25 if pre-paid

REGISTER AND PAY HERE:
http://bostonsxedsalo...

****IMPORTANT!******

Pre-Payment Only Accepted. We are no longer accepting RSVP/Cash at door payments for speeddating events.
Five minutes goes by in a flash! Before you know it, you`ll be on your last date. Make a check next to the names of people you wish to hear from again and turn in your dating
card.

Please arrive no later than 7:30pm

FAQ`S

What Do I Wear?
Dress to impress. Business casual attire is best. Please try to avoid wearing jeans, sneakers or t-shirts.

How Many Dates Will I Have?
You`ll have 7-10 five minute dates.

How Come Only 7-10 Dates?
Because we want you to be able to remember each person you met and spend quality time with each person. We don`t want you feeling frazzled or rushed.

When Will I Get My Match Results?
We will send you an e-mail within 48 hours after the event listing your potential matches.

It`s Been 48 Hours. Where Are My Matches?
Spam filters often block certain IP addresses. It can happen at any given time and without any warning. (Especially AOL, Hotmail & Earthlink.) First, check you bulk/spam folders. Then, if you do not find your match e-mail, contact us at 888-243-9765.

Please, please, PLEASE make sure to add these addresses as accepted users to your e-mail client:

moxieinthecity@yahoo.com
matches@moxieinthecity.net

***PLEASE NOTE****
You will not be admitted into this event if you arrive after 7:30pm. No exceptions. There are no refunds or credits if you arrive late.

group.name: Boston New In Town Meetup Group

item.name: SpeedDating Ages 29-39
